channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Backup by 10Web – Backup and Restore Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24426|2024-08-03T19:28:23.844Z -- unknown -- backup%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20backup%20and%20restore%20plugin
item.description: The Backup by 10Web – Backup and Restore Plugin WordPress plugin through 1.0.20 does not sanitise or escape the tab parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
